simplesect.para: vrna_sc_mod_read_from_jsonfile(), vrna_sc_mod_read_from_json(), vrna_sc_mod()

briefdescription.para: Parse and extract energy parameters for a modified base from a JSON file.

simplesect.para: vrna_sc_mod_read_from_json(), vrna_sc_mod_parameters_free(), vrna_sc_mod(), modified-bases-params

parameterdescription.para: The JSON file containing the specifications of the modified base
A model-details data structure (for look-up of canonical base pairs)

simplesect.para: Parameters of the modified base

parblock.para: This function is available as an overloaded function sc_mod_read_from_jsonfile() where the md parameter may be omitted and defaults to NULL. See, e.g. embed:rst:inline :py:func:`RNA.sc_mod_read_from_jsonfile()` in the :doc:`/api_python` .

briefdescription.para: Parse and extract energy parameters for a modified base from a JSON string.

simplesect.para: vrna_sc_mod_read_from_jsonfile(), vrna_sc_mod_parameters_free(), vrna_sc_mod(), modified-bases-params

parameterdescription.para: The JSON file containing the specifications of the modified base
A model-details data structure (for look-up of canonical base pairs)

simplesect.para: Parameters of the modified base

parblock.para: This function is available as an overloaded function sc_mod_read_from_json() where the md parameter may be omitted and defaults to NULL. See, e.g. embed:rst:inline :py:func:`RNA.sc_mod_read_from_json()` in the :doc:`/api_python` .

briefdescription.para: Release memory occupied by a modified base parameter data structure.

detaileddescription.para: Properly free a vrna_sc_mod_param_t data structure

parameterdescription.para: The data structure to free

memberdef.argsstring: (vrna_fold_compound_t *fc, const char *json, const unsigned int *modification_sites, unsigned int options)
memberdef.name: vrna_sc_mod_json

briefdescription.para: Prepare soft constraint callbacks for modified base as specified in JSON string.

detaileddescription.para: This function prepares all requirements to acknowledge modified bases as specified in the provided json string. All subsequent predictions will treat each modification site special and adjust energy contributions if necessary.

simplesect.para: vrna_sc_mod_jsonfile(), vrna_sc_mod(), vrna_sc_mod_m6A(), vrna_sc_mod_pseudouridine(), vrna_sc_mod_inosine(), vrna_sc_mod_7DA(), vrna_sc_mod_purine(), vrna_sc_mod_dihydrouridine(), VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_FALLBACK, VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_UNMOD, VRNA_SC_MOD_SILENT, VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT, modified-bases-params

parameterdescription.para: The fold_compound the corrections should be bound to
The JSON formatted string with the modified base parameters
A list of modification site, i.e. positions that contain the modified base (1-based, last element in the list indicated by 0)
A bitvector of options how to handle the input, e.g. VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT

simplesect.para: Number of sequence positions modified base parameters will be used for

parblock.para: This function is attached as overloaded method sc_mod_json() to objects of type fold_compound with default options = VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT. See, e.g. embed:rst:inline :py:meth:`RNA.fold_compound.sc_mod_json()` in the :doc:`/api_python` .

memberdef.argsstring: (vrna_fold_compound_t *fc, const char *json_file, const unsigned int *modification_sites, unsigned int options)
memberdef.name: vrna_sc_mod_jsonfile

briefdescription.para: Prepare soft constraint callbacks for modified base as specified in JSON string.

detaileddescription.para: Similar to vrna_sc_mod_json(), this function prepares all requirements to acknowledge modified bases as specified in the provided json file. All subsequent predictions will treat each modification site special and adjust energy contributions if necessary.

simplesect.para: vrna_sc_mod_json(), vrna_sc_mod(), vrna_sc_mod_m6A(), vrna_sc_mod_pseudouridine(), vrna_sc_mod_inosine(), vrna_sc_mod_7DA(), vrna_sc_mod_purine(), vrna_sc_mod_dihydrouridine(), VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_FALLBACK, VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_UNMOD, VRNA_SC_MOD_SILENT, VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT, modified-bases-params

parameterdescription.para: The fold_compound the corrections should be bound to
The JSON formatted string with the modified base parameters
A list of modification site, i.e. positions that contain the modified base (1-based, last element in the list indicated by 0)

simplesect.para: Number of sequence positions modified base parameters will be used for

parblock.para: This function is attached as overloaded method sc_mod_jsonfile() to objects of type fold_compound with default options = VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT. See, e.g. embed:rst:inline :py:meth:`RNA.fold_compound.sc_mod_jsonfile()` in the :doc:`/api_python` .

memberdef.argsstring: (vrna_fold_compound_t *fc, const vrna_sc_mod_param_t params, const unsigned int *modification_sites, unsigned int options)
memberdef.name: vrna_sc_mod

briefdescription.para: Prepare soft constraint callbacks for modified base as specified in JSON string.

detaileddescription.para: This function takes a vrna_sc_mod_param_t data structure as obtained from vrna_sc_mod_read_from_json() or vrna_sc_mod_read_from_jsonfile() and prepares all requirements to acknowledge modified bases as specified in the provided params data structure. All subsequent predictions will treat each modification site special and adjust energy contributions if necessary.

simplesect.para: vrna_sc_mod_read_from_json(), vrna_sc_mod_read_from_jsonfile(), vrna_sc_mod_json(), vrna_sc_mod_jsonfile(), vrna_sc_mod_m6A(), vrna_sc_mod_pseudouridine(), vrna_sc_mod_inosine(), vrna_sc_mod_7DA(), vrna_sc_mod_purine(), vrna_sc_mod_dihydrouridine() VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_FALLBACK, VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_UNMOD, VRNA_SC_MOD_SILENT, VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT

parameterdescription.para: The fold_compound the corrections should be bound to
The JSON formatted string with the modified base parameters
A list of modification site, i.e. positions that contain the modified base (1-based, last element in the list indicated by 0)
A bitvector of options how to handle the input, e.g. VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT

simplesect.para: Number of sequence positions modified base parameters will be used for

parblock.para: This function is attached as overloaded method sc_mod() to objects of type fold_compound with default options = VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT. See, e.g. embed:rst:inline :py:meth:`RNA.fold_compound.sc_mod()` in the :doc:`/api_python` .

memberdef.argsstring: (vrna_fold_compound_t *fc, const unsigned int *modification_sites, unsigned int options)
memberdef.name: vrna_sc_mod_m6A

briefdescription.para: Add soft constraint callbacks for N6-methyl-adenosine (m6A)

detaileddescription.para: This is a convenience wrapper to add support for m6A using the soft constraint callback mechanism. Modification sites are provided as a list of sequence positions (1-based). Energy parameter corrections are derived from embed:rst:inline :cite:t:`kierzek:2022` .

simplesect.para: VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_FALLBACK, VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_UNMOD, VRNA_SC_MOD_SILENT, VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT

parameterdescription.para: The fold_compound the corrections should be bound to
A list of modification site, i.e. positions that contain the modified base (1-based, last element in the list indicated by 0)
A bitvector of options how to handle the input, e.g. VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT

simplesect.para: Number of sequence positions modified base parameters will be used for

parblock.para: This function is attached as overloaded method sc_mod_m6A() to objects of type fold_compound with default options = VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT. See, e.g. embed:rst:inline :py:meth:`RNA.fold_compound.sc_mod_m6A()` in the :doc:`/api_python` .

memberdef.argsstring: (vrna_fold_compound_t *fc, const unsigned int *modification_sites, unsigned int options)
memberdef.name: vrna_sc_mod_pseudouridine

briefdescription.para: Add soft constraint callbacks for Pseudouridine.

detaileddescription.para: This is a convenience wrapper to add support for pseudouridine using the soft constraint callback mechanism. Modification sites are provided as a list of sequence positions (1-based). Energy parameter corrections are derived from embed:rst:inline :cite:t:`hudson:2013` .

simplesect.para: VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_FALLBACK, VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_UNMOD, VRNA_SC_MOD_SILENT, VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT

parameterdescription.para: The fold_compound the corrections should be bound to
A list of modification site, i.e. positions that contain the modified base (1-based, last element in the list indicated by 0)
A bitvector of options how to handle the input, e.g. VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT

simplesect.para: Number of sequence positions modified base parameters will be used for

parblock.para: This function is attached as overloaded method sc_mod_pseudouridine() to objects of type fold_compound with default options = VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT. See, e.g. embed:rst:inline :py:meth:`RNA.fold_compound.sc_mod_pseudouridine()` in the :doc:`/api_python` .

memberdef.argsstring: (vrna_fold_compound_t *fc, const unsigned int *modification_sites, unsigned int options)
memberdef.name: vrna_sc_mod_inosine

briefdescription.para: Add soft constraint callbacks for Inosine.

detaileddescription.para: This is a convenience wrapper to add support for inosine using the soft constraint callback mechanism. Modification sites are provided as a list of sequence positions (1-based). Energy parameter corrections are derived from embed:rst:inline :cite:t:`wright:2007` and embed:rst:inline :cite:t:`wright:2018` .

simplesect.para: VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_FALLBACK, VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_UNMOD, VRNA_SC_MOD_SILENT, VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT

parameterdescription.para: The fold_compound the corrections should be bound to
A list of modification site, i.e. positions that contain the modified base (1-based, last element in the list indicated by 0)
A bitvector of options how to handle the input, e.g. VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT

simplesect.para: Number of sequence positions modified base parameters will be used for

parblock.para: This function is attached as overloaded method sc_mod_inosine() to objects of type fold_compound with default options = VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT. See, e.g. embed:rst:inline :py:meth:`RNA.fold_compound.sc_mod_inosine()` in the :doc:`/api_python` .

memberdef.argsstring: (vrna_fold_compound_t *fc, const unsigned int *modification_sites, unsigned int options)
memberdef.name: vrna_sc_mod_7DA

detaileddescription.para: This is a convenience wrapper to add support for 7-deaza-adenosine using the soft constraint callback mechanism. Modification sites are provided as a list of sequence positions (1-based). Energy parameter corrections are derived from embed:rst:inline :cite:t:`richardson:2016` .

simplesect.para: VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_FALLBACK, VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_UNMOD, VRNA_SC_MOD_SILENT, VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT

parameterdescription.para: The fold_compound the corrections should be bound to
A list of modification site, i.e. positions that contain the modified base (1-based, last element in the list indicated by 0)
A bitvector of options how to handle the input, e.g. VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT

simplesect.para: Number of sequence positions modified base parameters will be used for

parblock.para: This function is attached as overloaded method sc_mod_7DA() to objects of type fold_compound with default options = VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT. See, e.g. embed:rst:inline :py:meth:`RNA.fold_compound.sc_mod_7DA()` in the :doc:`/api_python` .

memberdef.argsstring: (vrna_fold_compound_t *fc, const unsigned int *modification_sites, unsigned int options)
memberdef.name: vrna_sc_mod_purine

briefdescription.para: Add soft constraint callbacks for Purine (a.k.a. nebularine)

detaileddescription.para: This is a convenience wrapper to add support for Purine using the soft constraint callback mechanism. Modification sites are provided as a list of sequence positions (1-based). Energy parameter corrections are derived from embed:rst:inline :cite:t:`jolley:2017` .

simplesect.para: VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_FALLBACK, VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_UNMOD, VRNA_SC_MOD_SILENT, VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT

parameterdescription.para: The fold_compound the corrections should be bound to
A list of modification site, i.e. positions that contain the modified base (1-based, last element in the list indicated by 0)
A bitvector of options how to handle the input, e.g. VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT

simplesect.para: Number of sequence positions modified base parameters will be used for

parblock.para: This function is attached as overloaded method sc_mod_purine() to objects of type fold_compound with default options = VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT. See, e.g. embed:rst:inline :py:meth:`RNA.fold_compound.sc_mod_purine()` in the :doc:`/api_python` .

memberdef.argsstring: (vrna_fold_compound_t *fc, const unsigned int *modification_sites, unsigned int options)
memberdef.name: vrna_sc_mod_dihydrouridine

briefdescription.para: Add soft constraint callbacks for dihydrouridine.

detaileddescription.para: This is a convenience wrapper to add support for dihydrouridine using the soft constraint callback mechanism. Modification sites are provided as a list of sequence positions (1-based). Energy parameter corrections are derived from Rosetta/RECESS predictions.

simplesect.para: VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_FALLBACK, VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_UNMOD, VRNA_SC_MOD_SILENT, VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT

parameterdescription.para: The fold_compound the corrections should be bound to
A list of modification site, i.e. positions that contain the modified base (1-based, last element in the list indicated by 0)
A bitvector of options how to handle the input, e.g. VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT

simplesect.para: Number of sequence positions modified base parameters will be used for

parblock.para: This function is attached as overloaded method sc_mod_dihydrouridine() to objects of type fold_compound with default options = VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT. See, e.g. embed:rst:inline :py:meth:`RNA.fold_compound.sc_mod_dihydrouridine()` in the :doc:`/api_python` .

briefdescription.para: Check for sequence positions whether they resemble the fallback base.

detaileddescription.para: This flag can be used to enable a sanity check within the vrna_sc_mod*() functions to see whether a supposedly modified position actually resembles the fallback base as specified in the modification parameters

simplesect.para: vrna_sc_mod_json(), vrna_sc_mod_jsonfile(), vrna_sc_mod(), vrna_sc_mod_m6A(), vrna_sc_mod_pseudouridine(), vrna_sc_mod_inosine(), vrna_sc_mod_7DA(), vrna_sc_mod_purine(), vrna_sc_mod_dihydrouridine(), VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_UNMOD, VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT

briefdescription.para: Check for sequence positions whether they resemble the unmodified base.

detaileddescription.para: This flag can be used to enable a sanity check within the vrna_sc_mod*() functions to see whether a supposedly modified position actually resembles the unmodified base as specified in the modification parameters

simplesect.para: vrna_sc_mod_json(), vrna_sc_mod_jsonfile(), vrna_sc_mod(), vrna_sc_mod_m6A(), vrna_sc_mod_pseudouridine(), vrna_sc_mod_inosine(), vrna_sc_mod_7DA(), vrna_sc_mod_purine(), vrna_sc_mod_dihydrouridine(), VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_FALLBACK, VRNA_SC_MOD_DEFAULT

briefdescription.para: Do not produce any warnings within the vrna_sc_mod*() functions.

simplesect.para: vrna_sc_mod_json(), vrna_sc_mod_jsonfile(), vrna_sc_mod(), vrna_sc_mod_m6A(), vrna_sc_mod_pseudouridine(), vrna_sc_mod_inosine(), vrna_sc_mod_7DA(), vrna_sc_mod_purine(), vrna_sc_mod_dihydrouridine()

briefdescription.para: Default settings for the vrna_sc_mod*() functions.

simplesect.para: vrna_sc_mod_json(), vrna_sc_mod_jsonfile(), vrna_sc_mod(), vrna_sc_mod_m6A(), vrna_sc_mod_pseudouridine(), vrna_sc_mod_inosine(), vrna_sc_mod_7DA(), vrna_sc_mod_purine(), vrna_sc_mod_dihydrouridine(), VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_FALLBACK, VRNA_SC_MOD_CHECK_UNMOD, VRNA_SC_MOD_SILENT

briefdescription.para: Support of modified bases in secondary structure prediction.
